alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Haakon; Mellette; Northern Jackson; Northern Meade Co Plains; Northern Oglala Lakota; Northern Perkins; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Jackson; Southern Meade Co Plains; Southern Oglala Lakota; Southern Perkins; Todd; Tripp; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 12:29PM MST until January 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY FROM 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. Northwest winds gusting as high as 45 mph this afternoon. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern, south central and southwestern South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation, the Pine Ridge Reservation and the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ this afternoon to 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. Areas of blowing and drifting snow today.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands. A wind chill advisory means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.
